summary: The diff implements best-effort URL fetching with redirect following and tolerant blob/video validation, adds more specific English URL error messages, and hardens the client-side MP3 encoding pipeline to avoid uncaught exceptions and ensure jobs end in Done/Failed. However, the diff also appears to include unrelated UI/theme/config additions not requested by REQ-6/7/8.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified global visual theme (colors/palette) and Tailwind configuration changes unrelated to the TikTok fetch messaging or MP3 crash fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6/REQ-7/REQ-8 focus on conversion crash hardening and URL-fetch/error messaging; theme changes are not requested in this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder hook file (useQueries.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for adding new hooks or placeholder files; BuildRequest also emphasizes frontend-only changes for these issues, but not adding unrelated scaffolding.
